Employment

WITH AEROGUARD

AeroGuard is currently selecting qualified flight instructors.

Benefits of building your flight experience with AeroGuard

  • Top pay in the industry, earn up to $68,000 in salary and bonuses
  • Free CFII or MEI for qualified instructors
  • Automatic pay raise in 9 months
  • Retention bonus
  • Up to $3,000 relocation assistance provided
  • 3 weeks of temporary housing available
  • Unique partnership with SkyWest Airlines providing airline mentorship & monthly workshops
  • Two campuses (KDVT and KCHD)
  • Onsite maintenance working 24 hours a day
  • 400+ students provides plenty of flying
  • More than 350 days of flying weather
  • Fly a standardized fleet of Piper Archers and Piper Seminoles

Minimum Qualifications

  • CFI
  • 3rd Class Medical
  • Ability to work in the United States

Application Process

Send your resume to cfijob@flyaeroguard.com.
